Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., :, /, =, +, - and @.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., :, /, =, +, - and @.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., :, /, =, +, - and @.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., :, /, =, +, - and @.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

LogGroupName.description: The name of the log group. If you don't specify a name, AWS CloudFormation generates a unique ID for the log group.
LogGroupName.markdownDescription:
The name of the log group. If you don't specify a name, AWS CloudFormation generates a unique ID for the log group.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 512  
Pattern: ^[.\-_/#A-Za-z0-9]{1,512}\Z  
Update requires: Replacement

KmsKeyId.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CMK to use when encrypting log data.
KmsKeyId.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CMK to use when encrypting log data.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^arn:[a-z0-9-]+:kms:[a-z0-9-]+:\d{12}:(key|alias)/.+\Z  
Update requires: No interruption

DataProtectionPolicy.description:
The body of the policy document you want to use for this topic.

You can only add one policy per topic.

The policy must be in JSON string format.

Length Constraints: Maximum length of 30720
DataProtectionPolicy.markdownDescription:
The body of the policy document you want to use for this topic.

You can only add one policy per topic.

The policy must be in JSON string format.

Length Constraints: Maximum length of 30720

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

RetentionInDays.description: The number of days to retain the log events in the specified log group. Possible values are: 1, 3, 5, 7, 14, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180, 365, 400, 545, 731, 1096, 1827, and 3653.
RetentionInDays.markdownDescription:
The number of days to retain the log events in the specified log group. Possible values are: 1, 3, 5, 7, 14, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180, 365, 400, 545, 731, 1096, 1827, and 3653.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Allowed Values: 1 | 3 | 5 | 7 | 14 | 30 | 60 | 90 | 120 | 150 | 180 | 365 | 400 | 545 | 731 | 1096 | 1827 | 2192 | 2557 | 2922 | 3288 | 3653  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
The CloudWatch log group ARN.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
